question: Which noted personality topped the Fortuneâ€™s Businessperson of the Year 2019 list?
explanation: Microsoft\'s India-born Chief Executive Officer Satya Nadella has occupied the top spot in Fortune\'s Businessperson of the Year 2019 list, an annual compilation that also includes Mastercard CEO Ajay Banga and Arista head Jayshree Ullal. Fortune\'s annual Businessperson of the Year list features 20 business leaders \"who tackled audacious goals, overcame impossible odds, found creative solutions\".
